title: Rajasiromani Kundan & Emerald Haaram - A Regal Heirloom
materials: Cultured Pearls (ముత్యాలు). Features our signature Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: A breathtaking Kundan haaram featuring intricate floral and paisley (buta) motifs. Embellished with vibrant emeralds that draw the eye, complemented by delicate pearl drops. The detailed craftsmanship showcases the legacy of South Indian temple jewelry design. The pendant showcases a classic design that signifies abundance and prosperity.
colors: and shimmering white Kundan stones with pearl accents.
occasions: and significant celebrations like seemantham (సీమంతం). It is a grand statement piece suitable for any festive or formal occasion where you want to exude elegance and grace.
description: This haaram is a true masterpiece, blending traditional South Indian craftsmanship with timeless elegance. The vibrant emeralds symbolize growth and new beginnings, making it an ideal heirloom piece. Its intricate design and impeccable finish ensure lasting value and beauty.
